main event: On 28 July 1949, a civilian reported seeing three silver-blue circular objects tapering to a tail, observed from Tallman, New York.
interesting points: The objects were seen at an altitude of approximately 1000 feet., The observer noted a searchlight in the sky that seemed to be following the objects., Two of the objects were observed at five-minute intervals., The observation was made under high overcast weather with no visibility restrictions., The specifics of the sighting were reported to the military authorities.
sighted object: three silver-blue circular objects tapering to a tail
